content.html: Watched the final episode of Picard S2, and the series is a disappointment again. There are huge turning points for important characters, but they fall completely flat emotionally because there is *too much going on*. For the love of Q, @StarTrekOnPPlus, stop! Slow down!
content.value:
Watched the final episode of Picard S2, and the series is a disappointment again. There are huge turning points for important characters, but they fall completely flat emotionally because there is *too much going on*.

For the love of Q, @StarTrekOnPPlus, stop!

Slow down!
